item.hbs_traveler_rewards.enchanted_esse: A dust pile crafted from lapis, redstone, and amethyst
item.hbs_traveler_rewards.iron_bloom.des: Portion of an Iron Ingot that can be used to repair tools or armor but not to create new equipment
Piece of a diamond that can be used to repair tools or armor but not to create new equipment
item.hbs_traveler_rewards.savior_orb.des: When kept in your inventory it will spawn an entity in the world that saves your items, set a waypoint to your death location and will try to reunite with you when nearby
item.hbs_traveler_rewards.pure_heart.des: Grants an extra heart of health
item.hbs_traveler_rewards.soulbound_ritu: Right-click to make the current Item Slot 'Soulbound'. Right clicking a slot which is already Soulbound will make an internal inventory slot soulbound
item.hbs_traveler_rewards.fabrication_ri: A magic ritual granted to the Ancient Builders. It duplicates the contentes of a chest filled with building materials
No spot to place duplicate chest
Must be used on a chest
item.hbs_traveler_rewards.potion_pot.des: Cooks potion instantly, breaks on use. Add ingredients to the Pot inventory and then right click on water to brew.
item.hbs_traveler_rewards.escape_rope.de: Helps escape from a structure or cave system but only works at full health
item.hbs_traveler_rewards.escape_rope.no: You must be at full health to escape
Could not find a safe location
item.hbs_traveler_rewards.escape_rope.fa: Unable to escape from this location
item.hbs_traveler_rewards.escape_rope.no: You must be inside a structure or deep cave to escape
item.hbs_traveler_rewards.whetstone.desc: Adds 1 level of Sharpness to any weapon in an anvil. Up to Sharpness V.
item.hbs_traveler_rewards.bracing.desc: Adds 1 level of Unbreaking to any weapon or equipment item in an anvil. Up to Unbreaking V.
item.hbs_traveler_rewards.hourglass.desc: Adds 1 level of Lasting to any item in an anvil. Up to Lasting V.
item.hbs_traveler_rewards.netherite_whet: Adds 2 levels of Sharpness to any weapon in an anvil. Up to Sharpness X.
item.hbs_traveler_rewards.netherite_brac: Adds 2 levels of Unbreaking to any weapon or equipment item in an anvil. Up to Unbreaking X.
item.hbs_traveler_rewards.diamond_hourgl: Adds 2 levels of Lasting to any item in an anvil. Up to Lasting X.
item.hbs_traveler_rewards.mob_ward.desc: Right click to add items to the ward. Any mob that drops this item will be warded away
item.hbs_traveler_rewards.empty_totem.de: Preserves fragile items in its single inventory slot. Items with the Lasting curse will not decay in a totem
enchantment.hbs_traveler_rewards.lasting: Item will vanish from your inventory after several minutes or days. Lasting stacks up to X which lasts 64 days
This item has vanished due to the Curse of Lasting!
item.hbs_traveler_rewards.mob_ward.desc: Place an item to ward against specific mobs
gui.hbs_traveler_rewards.mob_ward.slot_e: Place an item to ward against mobs
item.hbs_traveler_rewards.potion_pot.des: Portable brewing stand with infinite awkward potions
